summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing the purchase of approximately 67.7 acres of real property in Section 36, Township 23 North, Range 8 East, W.M. in King County, Washington, commonly called the Mount Washington property, adjacent to the Cedar River Municipal Watershed, from the Washington State Parks and Recreation Commission, granting a recreational trail easement over a portion of the property, and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts.
